data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 22189, Version Hash: 81cb192b333eeafe2e866b97813a98b23a3b7931
data.actual_result: It shows the dialogue to confirm deleting that message
data.short_description: Shift clicking `Delete` on the menu given by the three dots on the message doesn't skip the delete confirmation menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message or pick a message you have permissions to delete - Click on the three dots on the side of the desired message - Shift click the `Delete` button
